pr_title: Open in browser button now really opens in browser

timeline.body: Maybe the title should be changed to something like "Open in browser"
timeline.bodyText: Maybe the title should be changed to something like "Open in browser"
timeline.bodyHTML: Maybe the title should be changed to something like "Open in browser"
timeline.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText:
Nope, that's why i did this PR: it doesn't open in browser, but in favorite / default app for the type of link (in NewPipe case, "open in Browser" doesn't open browser but newpipe, so it's pointless) , and if there is no default app set for this type of link, it opens a chooser (with browser and NewPipe).
What about openInDefaultApp()?
replies.author: B0pol

replies.bodyText:
Oh right sorry ;-)
Yeah, openInDefaultApp() is maybe a better name
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.body: Move the intent instantiation code inside the else branch, as it is not needed otherwise
timeline.bodyText: Move the intent instantiation code inside the else branch, as it is not needed otherwise
timeline.bodyHTML: Move the intent instantiation code inside the else branch, as it is not needed otherwise
timeline.author: Stypox

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
final Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW);
intent.setData(Uri.parse(url));
final Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, Uri.parse(url));
timeline.author: Stypox

timeline.message: Open in browser button now really opens in browser
